translation.ko: 의료 텐트의 사이먼에게 그 상자들 전해 줘요

translation.en: We'll drop off the rest and fly some folks to the hospital.
-[William] Yeah. -Come on, this way.
Right, we still got some more space here, mate.
[man] This is the last of the apple boxes.
[Jeff] Uh, Chilli Beach, supplies on the way. ETA 15:40.
translation.ko: 칠리 비치, 구호 물품이 가고 있다 오후 3시 40분쯤 도착한다

translation.en: There's medical, food, water.
Threw in a bottle of Scotch in there for you, Steve.
translation.ko: 자네를 위해서 스카치위스키도 한 병 넣었어, 스미티

translation.en: Thought you might need it. Over.
Roger, Packers Bay.
Supplies on the way. There's medical, food, water, blankets.
translation.ko: 구호 물품이 가고 있다 약, 음식, 물, 담요를 보냈다

translation.en: [Dana] All right, you guys have that.
-Hey. You're looking better. -[man] Yeah.
-Hey. -Please. Here, have this…
[Dana] No, yeah, that's fine. Keep it.
You know, you, um…
-You were amazing today. -[chuckles]
No, I mean it.
Today was a team effort.
Yeah, I'd rather think I was more there for emotional support.
translation.ko: 네, 난 그냥 옆에서 응원이나 했죠

translation.en: The only way we were able to do as much as we did today was because of your help.
translation.ko: 당신 도움이 없었다면 이렇게 많은 일은 못 했어요

translation.en: Not everyone would jump in like that.
translation.ko: 누구나 그렇게 바로 도우려 나서지 않아요

translation.en: I've got to admit it.
Having a flying partner these last few days, well,
translation.ko: 지난 며칠간 비행 파트너와 함께 일해 보니

translation.en: hasn't been so bad.
So, thanks.
After everything these people have been through,
they still manage to muster a smile.
[Dana] Well, I guess that's a part of what makes this place so special.
[William] I completely forgot I had this on me.
I guess you're gonna want to get that dry cleaned.
Or not.
-Wait. How much did that cost? -A lot.
Yeah. Right.
To Fullerton Airways.
To Fullerton Airways.
You know, without the tie,
you kind of look like you could fit in here.
Just maybe.
-I hate to interrupt, but… -Hello, Dad.
I've just had an e-mail from ITCM Financial.
And?
Well, they've informed me that we're shut down. Effective immediately.
translation.ko: 우리 회사를 닫는다는구나 지금 즉시 말이야

translation.en: -They're… -Dad.
They're splitting us up for parts.
Will, if you're gonna do something, now would be a really good time.
translation.ko: 윌… 뭔가를 할 생각이라면 지금이 딱 좋은 때야

translation.en: Right.
[Mary] Hello. Duncan Mitchell's office.
Mary, it's Will. William. Can you, um, put my father on, please?
translation.ko: 메리, 윌이에요, 윌리엄요 아버지 좀 바꿔 줄래요?

translation.en: I'm sorry. Mr. Mitchell's in a meeting.
Mary, can you go and get my father now? Please, it's an emergency.
translation.ko: 메리, 지금 가서 말씀드릴래요? 부탁이에요, 급한 일이에요

translation.en: Just a moment.
William, this had better be damned important.
translation.ko: 윌리엄, 정말 중요한 일이어야 할 거다

translation.en: Dad, don't sell Fullerton Airways.
All right? Please don't do this.
Are you serious?
Scrapping that two-bit airline
is about the only bright side of this debacle.
I can find the money somewhere else.
All right? Just give me… Give me time.
translation.ko: 아시겠어요? 그냥… 그냥 시간을 좀 주세요

translation.en: The board has been briefed. I did your job for you.
translation.ko: 이사회에는 이미 알렸다 네 일을 내가 대신 했다고

translation.en: It's done.
Dad, there's… There's value here. All right?
What was the point of me coming all this way?
The point of the venture was to prove to the company that you were ready.
translation.ko: 회사에 네가 준비됐다는 걸 보여주기 위해서였지

translation.en: Ready to take the next step.
Ready for real responsibility. I believed that you were--
translation.ko: 제대로 된 직책을 맡을 준비가 된 줄 알았는데…

translation.en: Dad, you're not listening to what I'm saying.
We'll talk more when you get back.
-No, Dana-- -Best to let her go, mate.
Jeff, I'm so sorry.
Yeah, I know, son. You did your best, but, uh,
fathers can be… stubborn sometimes.
Mary, no further calls.
You take care of yourself.
Jeff… look, if there's anything I can do…
translation.ko: 제프 제가 할 수 있는 게 있다면…

translation.en: Uh, keep working on that spin ball.
Stay, uh, above the batter's eyeline.
Okay? [chuckles]
-Okay? -All right.
I'll see you around, mate.
[Jeff] She would have been proud of you, you know?
translation.ko: 네 엄마는 널 자랑스러워할 거야, 알지?

translation.en: I don't know about that.
Haven't exactly done the best job in keeping this place going.
You know your mother's saying,
"If you want something done, you do it yourself."
Well, that's about having the strength to stand up
translation.ko: 뭔가 해야 할 일이 있을 때

translation.en: when you see something that needs doing.
It's about taking action.
But that doesn't mean that it's your job to fix everything by yourself.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 모든 걸 너 혼자 해결해야 한단 뜻은 아니란다

translation.en: -Oh, she loved this place. -Yeah.
But the last thing she would have wanted was for it to become a burden for you.
translation.ko: 하지만 클라라는 이곳이 네게 짐이 되길 바라진 않을 거야

translation.en: What she wanted
more than anything else was for you to be happy.
translation.ko: 다른 무엇보다 원한 건 네가 행복해지는 거였단다

translation.en: Yeah.
-I really miss her, Dad. [sniffles] -I know, sweetheart.
translation.ko: 엄마가 보고 싶어요, 아빠 알아, 우리 딸

translation.en: So do I.
[Nikki] Oh, man, ITCM's gonna
translation.ko: 맙소사 ITCM이 이 낡은 기계를 파느라 고생 좀 하겠네요

translation.en: have a hell of a hard time trying to sell this old girl.
translation.ko: ITCM이 이 낡은 기계를 파느라 고생 좀 하겠네요

translation.en: Think I could just chuck 20 bucks and keep it?
translation.ko: 20달러 내고 이 무전기 내가 챙기면 안 될까요?

translation.en: To hell with that. You keep it, love. Give it a good home.
translation.ko: 뭐 어때 챙기라고 집에 데려가서 행복하게 해줘

translation.en: You know she's just gonna disassemble it for parts within ten minutes, right?
translation.ko: 10분도 안 돼서 부품 챙기려고 해체해 버릴걸요, 아니에요?

translation.en: Still, better than lining the pockets of those greedy bastards across the pond.
translation.ko: 그 탐욕스러운 영국 개자식들 주머니를 채우는 것보단 낫지

translation.en: [Nikki] Oh, no. [in British accent] Mr. Darcy's tablet is broken.
translation.ko: 아, 이런 그 사람 태블릿이 고장 났잖아

translation.en: Perhaps he'll have to ask Papa for a new one.
Yeah.
I'm being a bit harsh on him, you reckon?
[Dana] Doesn't matter. The damage is done.
I think he meant well.
I just feel like surely he knows some way
translation.ko: 그냥 그 사람 아버지랑 일을 잘 해결할

translation.en: to sweeten the deal with his old man, you know? Surely.
translation.ko: 방법이 있을 텐데 싶어서 분명히 말이야

translation.en: If my dad had a private equity firm… [exclaims]
translation.ko: 우리 아버지가 사모 펀드 회사 회장이면

translation.en: Tell you what, there'd be no more duct tape engineering.
translation.ko: 강력 테이프로 설비를 수리할 필요도 없겠지

translation.en: It'd all be world class, baby. Just state of the art.
translation.ko: 여긴 세계적인 항공사가 될 거야 최첨단 설비도 갖추고

translation.en: -Wait. What'd you say? -State of the art?
That's it.
Yeah. Tell me about it.
No, I mean it. That's it.
No, you've lost me completely.
Dad, I have an idea. Hear me out.
translation.ko: 아빠, 제게 생각이 있어요 들어 봐요

translation.en: Sure you're okay to go alone?
Don't worry, I'll be fine.
Just keep everything together until I get back.
translation.ko: 제가 돌아올 때까지 회사를 잘 부탁해요

translation.en: Oh, and do me a favor. Radio ahead, get me a place to set down in Brissy.
translation.ko: 하나만 부탁할게요 미리 무전으로 브리즈번에 장소를 좀 구해 줘요

translation.en: Need to keep the old girl around for a few days.
All right. You got it. And, D, your mom would be so proud.
translation.ko: 그래, 알겠어, 그리고 D 네 엄마가 정말 자랑스러워할 거야

translation.en: You really think this is gonna work?
It's our only shot.
[woman] Ladies and gentlemen, please remain seated with your seatbelts fastened.
translation.ko: 신사 숙녀 여러분 안전띠를 매고 앉아 계십시오

translation.en: [Duncan] Thank you, Marcus. Now, for our final order of business,
translation.ko: 고마워, 마커스 자, 이제 우리 마지막 의제로

translation.en: I'd like to discuss a particularly noteworthy development
from the lab team over at ESA. Mary, would you please show--
translation.ko: 특별한 신개발품 이야기를 해 보지 - 메리, 자료를… - 정말 죄송합니다, 회장님

translation.en: [Mary] I'm sorry, sir. I'm afraid there's someone--
translation.ko: - 메리, 자료를… - 정말 죄송합니다, 회장님 여기 누가 찾아와서…

translation.en: -[woman] Excuse me? -G'day.
-Hi, Will. -Dana.
I'm sorry, who are you?
What are you doing here?
I didn't think I'd ever see you again.
translation.ko: 당신을 다신 못 볼 줄 알았는데

translation.en: Well, I need to speak to your old man.
William, what is the meaning of this? Who is this woman?
translation.ko: 윌리엄, 이게 무슨 일이냐? 그 여자는 누구지?

translation.en: Mr. Mitchell. Hi.
Uh, ladies and gentlemen of the board…
Yep. Well, my name is Dana Randall.
translation.ko: 네, 그게, 제 이름은 데이나 랜들이에요

translation.en: I'm the chief pilot at Fullerton Airways, a small Australian airline,
translation.ko: 풀러턴 에어웨이의 1등 조종사죠 여러분이 며칠 전 닫아 버린

translation.en: which you terminated a few days ago.
William, sit down.
Yeah.
[Duncan] Miss Randall, this is highly irregular.
-You'll need to leave. -If you give me five minutes--
-Mary, will you please call-- -Dad, Dad.
Let's hear her out.
Two minutes.
This had better be good.
Well, Fullerton Airways is a tiny operation
on the other side of the world.
But what you won't believe
is that we actually have something in common.
You see, we're both family businesses.
My mum and dad started ours when I was little and,
translation.ko: 제 부모님은 제가 어렸을 때 이 항공사를 세우셨고

translation.en: well, I promised myself that I would always protect it,
always keep it just the way that they made it.
The way that I always remembered it.
You know what happened? I killed it.
translation.ko: 어떻게 됐는지 아세요? 항공사는 망해 버렸죠

translation.en: I think it might be better--
I killed it because I didn't want anything to change.
translation.ko: 제가 아무것도 변하길 원하지 않았기 때문에요

translation.en: You know, and sometimes we do need to accept
translation.ko: 때로 우리는 이 사실을 받아들여야 해요

translation.en: that the best way forward is to chart a different course.
translation.ko: 앞으로 나아가는 가장 좋은 방법은 다른 비행경로를 계획하는 거예요

translation.en: Look I came here today with a proposal.
We cannot stand still any longer.
translation.ko: 더는 가만히 서 있어선 안 돼요

translation.en: The only way for Fullerton Airways to survive is to expand.
translation.ko: 풀러턴 에어웨이가 살아남으려면 사업을 확장해야 해요

translation.en: We need to bring in more pilots, more planes.
translation.ko: 조종사를 더 고용하고 비행기도 더 사야죠

translation.en: Here you go. This is yours. It's time to take the next step.
translation.ko: 여기요, 당신 거예요 다음 단계로 나아갈 때예요

translation.en: In order to do that, we are going to need a new injection of capital.
translation.ko: 그러기 위해서는 자금을 새로 지원받아야 해요

translation.en: Now, with your support, we'll be able to increase the coverage,
translation.ko: 여러분이 도와주시면 우리는 비행 지역을 늘리고

translation.en: almost triple the output within two years.
translation.ko: 2년 내로 수익을 세 배 이상 늘릴 수 있어요

translation.en: We can take Fullerton Airways
from a struggling family operation to a thriving business,
translation.ko: 곤경에 빠진 가족 회사에서 번창하는 사업으로 바꿀 수 있죠

translation.en: one that continues to serve the community in meaningful and essential ways.
translation.ko: 의미 있고 중요한 방식으로 공동체에 이바지하는 사업으로요

translation.en: So, I mean, what do you think?
I think this has gone on long enough.
Miss Randall, this is absurd. I'm familiar with your situation.
translation.ko: 랜들 양, 터무니없는 소리요 난 당신이 처한 상황엔 익숙해요

translation.en: Do you honestly expect us to throw more money into this disaster?
translation.ko: 우리가 이 재앙 같은 사업에 돈을 더 투자해 줄 것 같소?

translation.en: There's no indication you'll be able to manage something like this.
translation.ko: 당신이 이런 큰 사업을 경영할 수 있단 보장도 없잖소

translation.en: What if they had a more experienced financial officer?
translation.ko: 더 경험 많은 재무 담당자가 있다면요?

translation.en: What?
Dad…
I'm resigning. Effective immediately.
I, uh… I'm gonna go and work for Fullerton Airways.
If they'll have me.
You must be joking.
No, I'm… I'm not.
But if you give me a chance to get this business on their feet,
translation.ko: 하지만 제게 이 사업을 일으킬 기회를 주신다면

translation.en: I will show you that they do have legs.
Don't be ridiculous.
I mean, why in heaven's name would you want to throw away a career?
translation.ko: 대체 왜 경력을 내던져 버리려는 거냐?

translation.en: Dad, you built this business. This was your dream.
translation.ko: 아버지 아버지는 이 회사를 세우셨죠 이건 아버지의 꿈이었어요

translation.en: Don't you remember how that felt?
To believe in something so badly that you had to see it done?
translation.ko: 무언가를 너무나 굳게 확신해서 꼭 해내야겠다고 다짐했을 때요

translation.en: But, William--
Look, I… I only came here because I wanted to make you proud.
translation.ko: - 하지만, 윌리엄… - 저기, 저는… 전 자랑스러운 아들이 되고 싶어서 여기 왔어요

translation.en: I still want that.
But I… I don't belong here.
I'm just asking you to trust me.
Trust us.
Please.
You really think you can do this?
We can.
Together.
-Mary. -Yes, sir?
Send in Simon and the legal team. We have a proposal to review.
translation.ko: 사이먼과 법률팀을 들여보내 검토할 제안이 하나 있어

translation.en: Shall we?
You sure about this? I mean, it's not going to be easy.
Well, are you sure you want to have a flying partner?
Something like that.
